name: Rootatouille
description:
This puzzle game is a part of the 2023 Global Game Jam with the theme: Roots.

Sjouke Yntema: Programmer

Casper van de Laar: UI & Audio Designer

Rowan Meijer: Background & Character Artist

Wouter Yntema: Prop Artist

Controls:

  • Click-drag: When you hover over items, their silhouette lights up. That means it can be picked and dragged around. If you put them in the soup and something might happen. 

Objective: 

Patients come to you with their sicknesses or misfortunes. try to help them by diagnosing their problem (looking at the color and amount) and creating a potion for it by putting ingredients in the kettle. You have a couple of ingredients to work with: 

  • Blue Mold: Mixes a blue color in the potion. (Mix with yellow to make green or red to create purple.)
  • Yellow Sunflower: Mixes a yellow color in the potion.  (Mix with blue to make green or red to create orange.)
  • Red Beetroot: Mixes a red color in the potion. (Mix with blue to make purple or yellow to create orange.)
  • Spicey Herbs: Makes the potion stronger.
  • Bitter Carrot: Neutralizes the spices in the potion.
